channel.title: Zettelkastens on TechZerker
channel.description: Recent content in Zettelkastens on TechZerker

item.description: Zettelkasten Method Imhoff 202007262035 Stefan started Zettelkasten in 2019, and in his case found the Mac/iOS Devonthink software fit his design best. Stefan does not do regular #Tags, as his focus on Devonthink as the software, it does the equivalent of tags, but apparently smarter. Stefans version of workflow into his Zettelkasten is to have a handful of Inboxes to gather rough notes, things to reference and ideas. He then generally processes the inbox once a day into useful notes.
